Text:
http://www.nfl.com/kickoff/story/09000d5d8199fc33/article/dave-matthews-band-swift-to-help-kick-off-2010-season

The NBC show will feature performances by Grammy Award-winning artists Taylor Swift and Dave Matthews Band, and will be broadcast live from Jackson Square. More concert details including information on how the public can have a chance to join the live audience at Jackson Square will be announced shortly.
